column1: ######CK2 Plus buildings - credits to CK2 Plus Team

column2: This set of simple dirt roads has a few signs to help indicate where travelers and traders should go.
column3: Cet ensemble de routes de terre simples a quelques signes pour indiquer où les voyageurs et les commerçants doivent aller.
column4: This simple dirt road has a few signs to help indicate where travelers and traders should go.
column6: This simple dirt road has a few signs to help indicate where travelers and traders should go.

column2: The roads here have been improved with detailed signs posted as well as having been expanded to include some less travelled areas as part of this route. In addition the roads themselves have been improved, some areas even make use of cobblestone.
column3: Les routes ici ont été améliorées avec des panneaux détaillés et ont été élargies pour inclure des zones moins fréquentées dans le cadre des mêmes routes. De plus, les routes elles-mêmes ont été améliorées, certaines zones utilisent même des pavés.
column4: The roads here have been improved with detailed signs posted as well as having been expanded to include some less travelled areas as part of this route. In addition the roads themselves have been improved, some areas even make use of cobblestone.
column6: The roads here have been improved with detailed signs posted as well as having been expanded to include some less travelled areas as part of this route. In addition the roads themselves have been improved, some areas even make use of cobblestone.

column2: The roads here have been massively improved. Great care was taken to improve signage even further and large parts of the road now consist of some variant of stonework. Truely a trade route worthy of the name.
column3: Les routes ici ont été massivement améliorées. Un grand soin a été apporté à l'amélioration de la signalétique et de grandes parties de la route sont maintenant constituées d'une variante d'édifice en pierre. C'est vraiment une route commerciale digne de ce nom.
column4: The roads here have been massively improved. Great care was taken to improve signage even further and large parts of the road now consist of some variant of stonework. Truely a trade route worthy of the name.
column6: The roads here have been massively improved. Great care was taken to improve signage even further and large parts of the road now consist of some variant of stonework. Truely a trade route worthy of the name.
